thread.title: Colin Kaepernick donates $50K to Meals on Wheels after Trump swipe
thread.title_full: Colin Kaepernick donates $50K to Meals on Wheels after Trump swipe

author: The Associated Press
title: Colin Kaepernick donates $50K to Meals on Wheels after Trump swipe
text: Thirteen Days of Tony Romo: The latest on the Cowboys’ QB conundrum March 22, 2017, 9:34 am Romo is still a Cowboy, a lame-duck one, and the Texans and Broncos are still viewed as the leading contenders to sign him, if Jones releases Romo. March 21, 2017, 5:47 pm As Broncos reps, should John Elway and Brandon Marshall stick to sports? Man named in Tom Brady jersey case sought autographs, selfies March 21, 2017, 4:33 pm The Mexican media executive suspected of stealing Tom Brady’s jersey went to the Super Bowl as a working journalist but spent the week collecting selfies and autographs from football greats and boasting to colleagues that he was there as a fan. Donald Trump rips NFL QB Colin Kaepernick during speech in Kentucky March 21, 2017, 7:51 am Trump told the crowd he read an article reporting that NFL owners don’t want to pick Kaepernick up “because they don’t want to get a nasty tweet from Donald Trump.”
